Reviews.Title: False Advertising
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R. Cecil
Reviews.Content: DONT BE FOOLED. this is NOT A 120hz tv. this is rediculous. We purposely bought this tv over the Vizio and the Sharp brand 40 inch tv's that were cheaper (in store) and got home, realized the picture looked a little slow... BECAUSE ITS NOT TRULY A 120HZ TV. Advertises and says 120hz on the box and on the tv, but when you look into specs, its actually a 110V 60hz input. Stupid advertising techniques. Hopefully someone has the effort and knowledge to get these guys for false advertising or something to stop these games.

ProductInfo.Features:
120 Hz PMR for the ultimate in motion sharpness
Full HD LCD display, with a 1920x1080p resolution
3 HDMI inputs with Easylink for HD connection
Brilliant LED images with low power consumption
Enjoy rich sound and clear dialog with DTS TruSurround
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 40PFL5708/F7 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV (Black)
